alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 05 at 6:19AM PDT until November 05 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon and Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Simcoe Highlands. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will further decrease later this afternoon into the evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
